name: part_001
file: tmp_【#白上フブキ生誕LIVE】Congrats Birthday FOX【ホロライブ⧸白上フブキ】 [7Vs-5Rwu8ks]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Shirakami Fubuki performs the song 'Gimme! Revolution'.
MC section where Fubuki greets the audience and introduces the next song.
Shirakami Fubuki performs the song 'Garnet Moon'.

subtitles.original: ほら
subtitles.english: See,

subtitles.original: なんでもできそう
subtitles.english: I feel like I can do anything.

subtitles.original: YOU ARE MY HERO
subtitles.english: YOU ARE MY HERO

subtitles.original: TAKE ME HIGH
subtitles.english: TAKE ME HIGH

subtitles.original: 君と目指すの あの遥か
subtitles.english: Aiming for that distant place with you,

subtitles.original: 情熱のパラダイス
subtitles.english: a paradise of passion.

subtitles.original: もう 君が君でなきゃ
subtitles.english: If you weren't you,

subtitles.original: この星がピンチなんだよ
subtitles.english: this planet would be in a pinch.

subtitles.original: BABY
subtitles.english: BABY

subtitles.original: ねぇ いつか言わせて
subtitles.english: Hey, let me say it someday,

subtitles.original: ときめきが生み出す言葉
subtitles.english: the words born from this heartbeat.

subtitles.original: それを 愛とリンクしちゃおう
subtitles.english: Let's link that with love.

subtitles.original: 大人未満 私の革命
subtitles.english: Less than an adult, my revolution.

subtitles.original: Wow!
subtitles.english: Wow!

subtitles.original: Go, go!
subtitles.english: Go, go!

subtitles.original: どっち？
subtitles.english: Which way?

subtitles.original: Oh my god!
subtitles.english: Oh my god!

subtitles.original: OK!
subtitles.english: OK!

subtitles.original: Come on!
subtitles.english: Come on!

subtitles.original: いつだって今が最高でしょ READY GO!
subtitles.english: Right now is always the best, right? READY GO!

subtitles.original: はい！ということで！皆様！どうですか！盛り上がってますか！
subtitles.english: Alright! So! Everyone! How are you doing? Are you hyped up?!

subtitles.original: このあともいっぱいいっぱい歌いますからねー！
subtitles.english: I'll be singing a lot more after this, okay!

subtitles.original: ねぇ 教えて 聞かせて
subtitles.english: Hey, tell me, let me hear it.

subtitles.original: これからどうなるの？
subtitles.english: What's going to happen from here?

subtitles.original: これ以上ないくらい
subtitles.english: More than anything else,

subtitles.original: ときめきが加速しちゃうよ
subtitles.english: my heart is starting to race.

subtitles.original: Only THE STAR 遥か 目覚めてく
subtitles.english: Only the star, distant, waking up.

subtitles.original: 私たちだけのカタチ
subtitles.english: A shape that's only ours.

subtitles.original: Tell me why 君に問いたい
subtitles.english: Tell me why, I want to ask you,

subtitles.original: その熱い情熱の進化
subtitles.english: the evolution of that hot passion.

subtitles.original: さぁ 君が君である存在が
subtitles.english: Now, the fact that you are you,

subtitles.original: 語る未来 BABY
subtitles.english: speaks of the future, baby.

subtitles.original: ねぇ もっと知りたい
subtitles.english: Hey, I want to know more,

subtitles.original: この胸が高鳴る仕組み
subtitles.english: the mechanism that makes my heart pound.

subtitles.original: もはや 恋さえ凌駕しちゃう
subtitles.english: It even surpasses love now,

subtitles.original: 新しい革命の予感
subtitles.english: a premonition of a new revolution.

subtitles.original: 今日も SOS 駆けつけて来てね HERO レスキュー！
subtitles.english: Come running to the SOS today too, Hero, rescue!

subtitles.original: おい！おい！おい！おい！
subtitles.english: Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi!

subtitles.original: はい！ということで！はい！１曲目からテンション上がっちゃいました！
subtitles.english: Alright! So! Yes! I've been hyped up since the first song!

subtitles.original: ということで皆様、こんきーつね！白上フブキでございます！はいフレンズ！
subtitles.english: So everyone, Konkitsune! It's Shirakami Fubuki! Hi friends!

subtitles.original: はぁー、テンション上がったー！
subtitles.english: Phew, I'm so hyped up!

subtitles.original: はい、そうですね、今日ですね、今回、
subtitles.english: Yes, well, today, this time,

subtitles.original: 白上フブキお誕生日イベント
subtitles.english: thank you for coming to Shirakami Fubuki's birthday event,

subtitles.original: 「Congrats Birthday FOX」にお越しいただきありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: "Congrats Birthday FOX"!

subtitles.original: いやもう本当に一人ぼっち緊張する...
subtitles.english: Man, I'm really nervous being all alone...

subtitles.original: いつも一人でこうやってあの、
subtitles.english: It's my first time doing a solo live

subtitles.original: YouTubeでソロライブやるの初めてなので、もうめちゃめちゃ緊張してますわ。
subtitles.english: on YouTube like this by myself, so I'm super duper nervous.

subtitles.original: なんですけども、早速２曲目行ってみたいと思います。
subtitles.english: But anyway, I'd like to move on to the second song right away.

subtitles.original: 聴いてください、ガーネット・ムーン。
subtitles.english: Please listen to: Garnet Moon.

subtitles.original: Garnet Moon / 作詞: 六ツ見純代 / 作曲: 迫 茂樹
subtitles.english: Garnet Moon / Lyrics: Sumiyo Mutsumi / Composition: Shigeki Sako

subtitles.original: 髪に刺した赤い薔薇は 情熱の色
subtitles.english: The red rose in my hair is the color of passion,

subtitles.original: 私を見たあなたまるで 熱いマタドール
subtitles.english: You, looking at me, are like a passionate matador.

subtitles.original: きらびやかに舞い踊れば 高鳴る胸
subtitles.english: If I dance brilliantly, my heart pounds,

subtitles.original: 二度と来ない時の色を 染めるエピソード
subtitles.english: an episode that colors the time that will never come again.

subtitles.original: 燃える 想い 奏でる ギター
subtitles.english: Burning thoughts, a playing guitar...

subtitles.original: 愛しさを紡ぐでしょう
subtitles.english: It will spin a tale of love, right?

subtitles.original: 旅人の傷跡痛むのなら 私の胸で眠りなさい
subtitles.english: If your traveler's scars ache, sleep on my breast.

subtitles.original: 慈しみながら 包んで
subtitles.english: While cherishing, I'll embrace,

subtitles.original: あなただけ照らすの 今宵の月のように
subtitles.english: and illuminate only you, like tonight's moon.

subtitles.original: 夢を探すあなたは行く 荒野の果て
subtitles.english: You, searching for dreams, go to the end of the wasteland.
